game.name: Gogi adventure
game.description:
The biggest adventure fun is ready to experience for you today! Are you ready to try it out when you want to make your mood fresh? Join Gogi Adventure and be prepared to guide a cute character on his most awaited adventure trip! Help him to become braver and stronger than before! Your objective in this brand new platform game is to help him to avoid all the deadly obstacles and reach him safely to his destination. You would have three lives to lose, so be careful. 

Many deadly walking zombies, dangerous plants and other monsters are waiting for you. Try to be smarter than before to avoid them and stay alive until you complete the mission in this html5 adventure game! Do not forget to grab the coins to boost your power, character and score as well. Put your best fighting abilities to the test to guide him go through the road safely! Make your character jump to allow him orbit around the small planet in a search for the coins!

You would lose a life every time when you land on a monster or miss your jump. Do not bother if you consume all your three lives and lose the game since you many times to try out this cool jumping challenge. Keep jumping over the monsters or any other bad evils until you clear all simple and advanced levels! Use the keyboard/mouse or tap the screen to move or jump your character! Enjoy more skill games for kids that are free to play online, no download required!
